headline: Trump in Davos, Netflix and Intel results on deck as earnings season ramps: What to watch this week
summary: A holiday-shortened trading week will bring investors the start of tech earnings and a key speech from President Trump in Davos.

headline: Strong Analyst Sentiment on Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) Amid CES AI Processor Launches Despite Nvidia Competition
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is included in our list of the best stocks to buy right now. As of January 12, 2026, 75% of analysts are bullish on Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD). The consensus price target of $281.50 implies a 38.60% upside. Recent analyst commentaries reinforce the positive trend, with Jefferies reiterating a […]

headline: Truist Reduces PT on Flutter Entertainment plc (FLUT) from $280 to $260, Reiterates ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Flutter Entertainment plc (NYSE:FLUT) is one of the best stocks to buy right now. On January 13, 2026, Truist reduced its price target on Flutter Entertainment plc (NYSE:FLUT) from $280 to $260, while reiterating a ‘Buy’ rating. While previewing 2026 for the U.S. gaming sector, the firm discussed the challenges from the previous year, including […]
